author: amerkay
description: Smart Water Doser for Farmbot: Automatically figures out which plant Farmbot is above and calculates how much water to dose each plant by age and OpenFarm spread and height data. The code is as annotated as could be, so have a look at https://github.com/amerkay/water-doser/

config.name: plant_search_radius
config.label: Use current location to search for closest plant within this radius.

config.name: water_ml_per_sec
config.label: Water ml per second. Default 100ml/s output.
help: Test yours by turning on the water for 1s using a ON-wait 1000ms-OFF sequence into a measuring cup

config.name: plant_adult_age_weeks
config.label: Assumption: at 15 weeks a plant becomes an adult (i.e. takes the full height and spread)
help: TODO, better per plant information source

config.name: to_ml_multiplier
config.label: Mutiplier to convert plant size to ml needed for watering. Default 3. Lower means less water.
help: 2-4 is a good range, depending on your plants.

config.name: weather_lat
config.label: TODO Farmbot's location Latitude from (lat,lon) for weather/rain reports.

config.name: weather_lon
config.label: TODO Farmbot's location Longitude from (lat,lon) for weather/rain reports.

config.name: debug
config.label: Debug mode (0-> No FW debug msg, 1-> FW debug msg (default), 2-> No move/exec - do save point data, 3-> simulation, log only)
help: 2 -> no move, no execute sequences. Do save point data and farmware debug log
3 -> simulation mode. No move, no execute sequence, no save meta data. Enable farmware debug log
